name: 黃正民
objective: 各種時域響應之電腦繪圖，矩陣各項特性分析與應用，根值軌跡圖，波德圖，奈奎士圖，PID控制器之設計，Lead-Lag補償器之設計，控制器時域及頻域分析，控制器在狀態空間之設計，實例探討，書報研讀。
schedule:
Week1: Introduction
Week2: Matlab Tutorial
Week3: Simulink Tutorial
Week4: Modeling in the Frequency Domain and Time Domain 
Week5: Time Response, Stability, Steady-State Errors
Week6: Root Locus Techniques and Frequency Response Techniques
Week7: PID Controller Design
Week8: Arduino Embedded System Applications
Week9: Midterm exam
Week10: Delta HMI
Week11: Delta PLC
Week12: Delta VFD
Week13: Delta ASDA
Week14: Delta ASDA
Week15: Industrial Robotic Applications
Week16: Industrial Robotic Applications
Week17: Industrial Robotic Applications
Week18: Final exam
scorePolicy:
Experimental report        20%
Attendance                 30%
Midterm Exam               25%
Final Exam                 25%
materials:
Norman S. Nise, Control Systems Engineering, 7/e, John Wiley & Sons, 2011.
MATLAB 程式設計入門，張智星，清蔚科技
